item.title: Why you should care about performance review
item.description: Apple stops all marketing for their iPhone… … quietly waiting for consumers to stumble upon and appreciate its cutting-edge technology and design on their own. Can you imagine that? ü§î New iPhone without advertising its ground-breaking camera features, synchronization mechanisms and computing speed. It‚Äôs an unthinkable scenario, highlighting the absurdity of expecting even the most revolutionary products to be recognized and appreciated without any effort. Probably you’ll agree with me that it does sound insane, right?
